thread.title: Drake becomes Jedi, Pokemon master and tennis champ in hilarious 'Hotline Bling' memes - Music
thread.title_full: Drake becomes Jedi, Pokemon master and tennis champ in hilarious 'Hotline Bling' memes - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Lewis Corner
title: Drake becomes Jedi, Pokemon master and tennis champ in hilarious 'Hotline Bling' memes - Music
text: Drake's dodgy dad dancing in his 'Hotline Bling' music video is the gift that keeps on giving.If the Canadian star foresaw just how many memes would be born out of his in-the-zone leg shaking and gentle bopping, then he's a genius - because it's everywhere.The latest hilarious memes to be created include Drake as a Jedi master, using his 'Hotline Bling' bop to fend off shots from Stormtroopers.Then there's the 28-year-old's mission to become a Pokemon master, flinging out his Pokeballs left, right and centre to the iconic theme tune.Drake proves he's a match for world number one Novak Djokovic with his swift tennis moves, racking up the points on Wii Sports.As for the basketball court, Drake doesn't need to be on it to score an impossible hoop.Need some pepperoni on your pizza in double time? Drake's got it sorted. Just call 0800PIZZABLING.Then there's the ultimate meme. Drake getting down to the Frasier theme tune.Drake dances to the Frasier theme quite nicely. pic.twitter.com/GK0X6iTlsz— Mark (@tole_cover) October 20, 2015Even when Drake is up against the Charlie Brown theme he is still on the beat.The Charlie Brown Theme #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat #DrakeIsAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/1BeBt9Sz86— drake dancing to (@DRAKEDANClNG) October 20, 2015Oh and Beyoncé. Flawless.TURN UP #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat pic.twitter.com/bQHREidbol— D (@KingDavonne_) October 20, 2015Drake's 'Hotline Bling' is out now and has so far peaked at number two on the US Hot 100 chart and number three in the UK.It's from Drake's forthcoming fourth studio album, which is expected to be released soon.
